text: The canton of Berre-l'Étang is an administrative division of the Bouches-du- Rhône department, in southeastern France. At the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, it was expanded from 3 to 9 communes. Its seat is in Berre-l'Étang.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône ==Composition== It consists of the following communes: #Berre-l'Étang #Cornillon-Confoux #Coudoux #La Fare-les-Oliviers #Lançon-Provence #Rognac #Saint-Chamas #Velaux #Ventabren ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Councillors!!Party!!Occupation |- |style="background- color: "| | 2015 | Christiane Pujol | FN | Commercial |- |style="background- color: " | | 2015 | Jean-Marie Verani | FN | Civil servant |} ==Pictures of the canton== {| |The Pont Flavien in Saint-Chamas |Lançon-Provence's street |Berre-l'Étang's beach |} ==References== Category:Cantons of Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Canton of Berre-l'Étang
